item.title: iPad mini 明年有望「吃」上 OLED 屏
item.guid: iPad-mini-明年有望「吃」上-OLED-屏
item.description:
According to Bloomberg, Apple is planning major adjustments to three products – the MacBook Air, iPad mini, and iPad Air – by equipping them with OLED screens. 据彭博社报道， 苹果正在计划对 MacBook Air、iPad mini、iPad Air 三款产品进行重大调整 —— 配备 OLED 屏幕。

Insiders revealed that the iPad mini has the chance to be the first of the three to receive an OLED screen upgrade, with the OLED iPad mini launching as early as next year. However, the report also pointed out that the new screen will cause the price of the OLED iPad mini to increase by $100 (approximately RMB 709). 知情人士透露，iPad mini 有机会成为三者里面最早一个获得 OLED 屏幕升级，OLED iPad mini 最早会在明年推出。但报道也指出，新的屏幕将会让 OLED 版 iPad mini 售价上涨 100 美元（约合人民币 709 元）。

At the same time, the new iPad mini is also expected to support water resistance, retain speaker openings, and adopt a waterproof rubber ring and waterproof adhesive solution. 同时，新款 iPad mini 还有望支持防水，并且保留扬声器开孔，采用防水胶圈、防水胶方案。

The next-generation iPad Air and MacBook Air will still use LCD screens, and the iPad Air will be the last model to complete the aforementioned plan. Additionally, there are no plans for the entry-level iPad to join the OLED lineup. 而 iPad Air 和 MacBook Air 在下一代则依然采用 LCD 屏幕，并且 iPad Air 将成为最晚完成上述计划的一个机型。另外，入门版 iPad 未有计划加入 OLED 阵营。

According to reporter Mark Gurman, Apple is currently preparing a new MacBook Pro with touchscreen functionality, planned for release in late 2026 or early 2027. This MacBook Pro will feature an OLED screen. 据记者 Mark Gurman 消息，苹果目前还在准备一款配备触屏功能的全新 MacBook Pro，并计划 2026 年底或 2027 年初推出。而该款 MacBook Pro 将搭载 OLED 屏幕。

item.title: Photoshop 将支持直连 ChatGPT
item.guid: Photoshop-将支持直连-ChatGPT
item.description:
Image courtesy of Computer Base

Recently, Adobe released new AI assistants for its Photoshop and Express tools, which can help users quickly create images. 日前，Adobe 发布了旗下 Photoshop、Express 两款工具的新款 AI 助手，其能帮助用户进行图像快速创作。

According to reports, the AI assistant used by Adobe Express can directly create new images and designs for users, who can then perform secondary creation. 据介绍，Adobe Express 所采用的 AI 助手可以直接为用户创建新图像和设计，随后用户再进行二次创作。

Photoshop's AI assistant, on the other hand, uses a sidebar approach to help the AI understand different layers. The official statement indicates that Photoshop's AI assistant can complete repetitive tasks such as removing backgrounds or changing colors. 而 Photoshop 的 AI 助手则是采用侧边栏的方式，方便 AI 理解不同图层。官方表示，Photoshop 的 AI 助手能够完成如移除背景或更改颜色等重复性任务。

Adobe stated that it is currently experimenting with a new type of assistant called "Project Moonlight." This assistant can collaborate with different assistants in other Adobe tools and connect to creators' social channels to better understand their style. Adobe 表示，其目前还在试验一种新型助手，名为「Project Moonlight」。该助手可以与其他 Adobe 工具中的不同助手协同工作，并连接到创作者的社交渠道以更好地理解其风格。

Additionally, at the recently held MAX 2025 conference, Adobe announced a new round of cooperation with OpenAI, integrating its Photoshop and Adobe Express into ChatGPT, allowing users to edit images simply by chatting with ChatGPT. 另外，在近期举办的 2025 年度 MAX 大会上， Adobe 宣布与 OpenAI 达成新一轮合作，将旗下 Photoshop 和 Adobe Express 整合进 ChatGPT，让用户只需要跟 ChatGPT 聊天就能修图。

Alexandru Costin, Adobe's Vice President, stated that this collaboration merely integrates the strengths of all parties, and they will not abandon their proprietary Firefly model. The advantage of this model is that its training data is entirely sourced from licensed content, ensuring no copyright compliance issues are violated, and the generated content can be used commercially. Adobe 副总裁 Alexandru Costin 表示，这次合作只是整合各方优势，他们不会放弃自有模型 Firefly，而这款模型的优势就是其训练数据完全源自己授权内容，确保不会触犯版权合规性问题，并且生成的内容可以商业使用。

item.title: 特斯拉已在为马斯克可能离任做准备
item.guid: 特斯拉已在为马斯克可能离任做准备
item.description:
Recently, Bloomberg reported that Robyn Denholm, Chair of Tesla's Board of Directors, stated that if shareholders vote against Musk's proposed $1 trillion compensation package at the upcoming annual shareholder meeting, Tesla is already preparing for the possibility of Musk's departure or reduced involvement in company affairs. 近日，据彭博社报道，特斯拉董事会主席 Robyn Denholm 表示，若在即将召开的年度股东大会上，股东投票反对马斯克提出的 1 万亿美元薪酬方案，特斯拉则已在为马斯克可能离任或减少参与公司事务的情况做准备。

The report stated that if Musk resigns or reduces his involvement, Tesla is prepared to appoint a new CEO from within the company to ensure what Denholm called an "orderly transition." She stated that internal succession is the most likely scenario, but the board has not entirely ruled out external candidates. 报道称， 若马斯克离职或降低参与度，特斯拉已准备好从公司内部任命新 CEO，以确保实现 Denholm 所说的 「有序过渡」。 其表示， 内部继任是最有可能的方案，但董事会也未完全排除外部候选人的可能性。

However, Denholm also stated that without Musk, Tesla could lose significant value. Additionally, in the official voting appeal released by Tesla, the company also stated: 但 Denholm 也表示， 特斯拉没有马斯克，将可能会失去巨大价值。另外，在特斯拉官方公布的投票呼吁中，公司也表示：

When negotiating this performance bonus, we inevitably considered what Tesla would be like without Musk, and we do not believe that is the future our shareholders deserve. At a time when businesses of all sizes are competing to be the first to bring groundbreaking AI technology to market, we cannot risk losing the industry's best leader to propel Tesla to the top.

Musk's compensation plan stipulates that he will receive approximately 25% voting control if he achieves significant growth milestones tied to Tesla's market capitalization (including the expansion of electric vehicles, robotics, and robotaxi projects). 马斯克的薪酬方案规定，若他达成与特斯拉市值挂钩的重大增长里程碑（包括电动汽车、机器人及机器人出租车项目的扩张），将获得约 25% 的投票控制权。

Musk has explicitly stated that if he cannot obtain his desired compensation structure, he may dedicate more time to his other companies, such as SpaceX and xAI. 马斯克已明确表示，若无法获得他期望的薪酬结构，他可能会将更多时间投入 SpaceX、xAI 等其他旗下公司。

Denholm revealed that if the compensation package does not receive sufficient support, Tesla has developed a "Plan B" and the company possesses a strong internal leadership team. Denholm 透露，若该薪酬方案未获足够支持，特斯拉已制定「B 计划」，且公司拥有强大的内部领导团队。

item.title: 小鹏 MONA M03 第 20 万台宣布下线
item.guid: 小鹏-MONA-M03-第-20-万台宣布下线
item.description:
Yesterday, Xpeng Motors announced that the 200,000th mass-produced unit of its MONA M03 model officially rolled off the production line. Notably, the Xpeng M03 achieved this milestone in 14 months. 昨日，小鹏汽车宣布，旗下 MONA M03 车型第 20 万台量产车正式下线。值得一提的是，小鹏 M03 达成该成绩用时 14 个月。

The Xpeng M03 was updated in May this year, with prices starting from 119,800 yuan. The Max version, which includes intelligent assisted driving, has a price reduced to 129,800 yuan. 小鹏 M03 于今年 5 月完成更新，售价为 11.98 万元起，其中带智能辅助驾驶的 Max 版本价格下探至 12.98 万元。

According to reports, the Xpeng MONA M03 Max version features the only "no-memory, no-route-limit, no-mileage-limit" urban intelligent assisted driving system in its class, and globally debuts imperceptible human-machine co-driving. The Max version boasts 508 TOPS computing power, an end-to-end large model, and AEB with a maximum braking speed of 130km/h. 据介绍，小鹏 MONA M03 Max 版本搭载同级唯一「无需记忆、不限路线、不限里程」的城市智能辅助驾驶，并全球首发无感知人机共驾。Max 版本拥有 508 TOPS 算力、端到端大模型、AEB 最高停车速 130km/h。

In terms of design, the Xpeng M03 adds three new exterior colors: Starry Twilight Purple, Misty Moon Gray, and Starry Rain Green, along with a Dawn Purple interior color. For seat comfort, the new Xpeng M03 version adds a three-airbag lumbar support for the driver, and the Max version upgrades to a capacitive steering wheel based on the original. 设计方面，小鹏 M03 新增星暮紫、微月灰、星雨青三款外饰配色和拂晓紫内饰配色。座椅舒适配置上，小鹏 M03 新版新增了主驾三气袋腰托，Max 版本在原有基础上升级了电容方向盘。

item.title: 「HomePod」成精，1X 人形机器人正式开售
item.guid: 「HomePod」成精，1X-人形机器人正式开售
item.description:
Yesterday, humanoid robot brand 1X officially launched sales of its NEO home robot. Let's look at the pricing: 昨日，人形机器人品牌 1X 正式开售了其 NEO 家庭机器人，先看售价：

It is divided into monthly rental and early bird buyout: the monthly rental is $499/month (approximately 3,542 RMB); the early bird buyout (with 3 years warranty) is $20,000 (approximately 141,982 RMB).

The overall appearance of the mass-produced 1X NEO is similar to the previous NEO Gamma design style, but the details are more anthropomorphic and warm. NEO is available in warm beige, gray-blue, and dark gray, with its surface covered by a large area of fabric material. 量产版 1X NEO 整体外观与此前的 NEO Gamma 设计风格类似，但细节更加拟人且温暖。NEO 提供暖米色、灰蓝色以及深灰色，表面由大面积布艺材料覆盖。

It is worth mentioning that the translucent mask previously used on the front of NEO Gamma has been replaced by fabric material on NEO, and 1X has given NEO two 'eye' cameras, making it more adorable overall. 值得一提的是， 此前在 NEO Gamma 正面使用的半透明遮罩在 NEO 变为了布艺材料，同时 1X 为 NEO 弄上了两枚「眼睛」摄像头，整体更加呆萌可爱。

For its hands, NEO is covered with a layer of rubber material; its head also features emotional light rings on both sides. 在手部方面，NEO 覆盖了一层橡胶材料；头部还拥有左右两侧的情感灯环。

In terms of AI performance, NEO supports combining visual and spatial perception with memory to provide personalized interaction. It also boasts a completely autonomous design. According to official introduction, NEO's early access offers basic autonomous functions, and with continued use, it will learn and unlock new features. AI 表现上，NEO 支持将视觉和空间感知与记忆相结合，提供个性化互动。并且其拥有完全自主设计。官方介绍，NEO 早期访问提供基础自主功能，随着持续使用，它将学习和解锁新功能。

item.title: 国内首款鸿蒙人形机器人光谷亮相
item.guid: 国内首款鸿蒙人形机器人光谷亮相
item.description:
According to news from 'China Optics Valley,' on October 28, the smart exhibition hall of the HarmonyOS Ecosystem (Wuhan) Innovation Center saw the stunning debut of 'Kuafu,' the first domestic robot equipped with the open-source HarmonyOS system. 据「中国光谷」消息，10 月 28 日，鸿蒙生态（武汉）创新中心的智慧展厅，国内首款搭载开源鸿蒙系统的机器人「夸父」惊艳亮相。

According to reports, 'Kuafu' was developed based on open-source HarmonyOS, breaking foreign technological monopolies and accelerating the construction of a fully autonomous and controllable robot ecosystem. 据介绍，「夸父」基于开源鸿蒙开发，打破了国外技术垄断，正加速构建全自主可控的机器人生态。

Du Jinbiao, General Manager of HarmonyOS Ecosystem Services (Shenzhen) Co., Ltd. and Director of the HarmonyOS Ecosystem Innovation Center, introduced: 'In the near future, in an environment equipped with HarmonyOS devices, you will only need to say "It's dark, please turn off the lights," and it will automatically adjust indoor lighting; say "This place needs cleaning," and it will arrange for a sweeping robot to work.' 鸿蒙生态服务（深圳）有限公司总经理、鸿蒙生态创新中心主任杜金彪介绍：「不久的将来，在配备鸿蒙设备的环境中，您只需说『天黑了，请关灯』，它就能自动调节室内照明；说『这里需要打扫』，它便会安排扫地机器人工作。」

Since its release in 2019, the global number of ecosystem devices equipped with HarmonyOS has exceeded 1 billion, making it the fastest-growing operating system worldwide. Over 1,300 devices have passed OpenHarmony compatibility certification, and more than 30,000 applications and meta-services are available on the HarmonyOS App Market. Market institutions predict that the HarmonyOS ecosystem is expected to unlock a trillion-yuan industrial space. 自 2019 年发布至今，全球搭载鸿蒙操作系统的生态设备已超过 10 亿台，成为全球发展最快的操作系统，超 1300 款设备通过 OpenHarmony 兼容性认证，3 万多款应用和元服务上架鸿蒙应用市场。市场机构预计，鸿蒙生态有望打开万亿元的产业空间。

item.title: 英伟达市值破 5 万亿美元
item.guid: 英伟达市值破-5-万亿美元
item.description:
At the opening of U.S. stocks on October 29, Nvidia's stock price rose by over 5%, with its market capitalization briefly reaching $5.13 trillion during trading, becoming the first company in history to break through $5 trillion in market value. 美股 10 月 29 日开盘，英伟达股价上涨超 5%， 盘中市值曾达 5.13 万亿美元，成为史上首个市值突破 5 万亿美元的公司。

As of local closing time, Nvidia's total market capitalization was $5.03 trillion. 截至当地收盘时间，英伟达总市值为 5.03 万亿美元。

According to media analysis, on the news front, Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang released a strong signal of AI demand. 据媒体分析，消息面上，英伟达 CEO 黄仁勋释放了 AI 需求强劲的信号。

Jensen Huang stated at the GTC DC conference on October 28 local time that it is now evident that the Blackwell and Rubin architecture chips could generate over $500 billion in revenue this year and in 2026, with this revenue coming from 20 million GPUs. This $500 billion revenue will be 5 times the revenue generated by Hopper architecture chips from 2023 to 2025. 黄仁勋在当地时间 10 月 28 日的 GTC DC 大会上表示，现在已经可以看到，今年及 2026 年，Blackwell 和 Rubin 架构芯片可带来的收入超 5000 亿美元，这个收入将来自 2000 万颗 GPU。5000 亿美元收入将是 2023 年~2025 年 Hopper 架构芯片所带来收入的 5 倍。

Regarding chip architecture iteration, Jensen Huang also showcased a superchip using the next-generation Rubin architecture. According to reports, the Rubin chip's computing power reaches 100 PFlops, which is 100 times the performance of Nvidia's first AI-specific computer, DGX-1. The Rubin chip will enter production around this time next year or even earlier. 芯片架构迭代方面，黄仁勋还展示了采用下一代架构 Rubin 的超级芯片。据介绍，Rubin 芯片的计算能力达到 100PFlops，是英伟达首款 AI 专用计算机 DGX-1 性能的 100 倍。Rubin 芯片将在明年这个时候或更早的时候进入生产。

item.title: 内存条价格大涨
item.guid: 内存条价格大涨
item.description:
According to Jiemian News, on October 29, the storage chip sector fluctuated upwards, with Shishang Technology hitting its daily limit for 6 consecutive trading days, Tongyou Technology rising over 7%, and Defu Technology, Yunhanxincheng, Xi'an Yicai, Biwin Storage, and others all climbing. 据界面新闻报道，10 月 29 日，存储芯片板块震荡走高，时空科技涨停走出 6 连板，同有科技涨超 7%，德福科技、云汉芯城、西安奕材、佰维存储等纷纷上扬。

Recently, storage product prices have shown an astonishing upward trend. Looking at spot market data, between October 13 and 18, in terms of DRAM, the average prices of DDR5 16G and DDR4 16G increased by 20.59% and 11.11% respectively compared to the previous week, and by as much as 58.73% and 43% compared to the previous month. 近期，存储产品价格呈现出惊人的上涨态势。从现货市场数据来看，在 10 月 13 日至 18 日期间，DRAM 方面，DDR5 16G、DDR4 16G 均价相较上周分别上涨 20.59%、11.11%，相较上月涨幅更是高达 58.73%、43%。

DDR stands for Double Data Rate, which is a core technical standard for memory modules (i.e., Dynamic Random Access Memory, DRAM) and one of the key indicators for measuring memory performance. DDR 全称为 Double Data Rate（双倍数据速率），是内存条（即动态随机存取存储器，DRAM）的核心技术标准，也是衡量内存性能的关键指标之一。

According to Haibao News, in Hangzhou, Zhejiang, memory stick prices have doubled in the past month. Some merchants stated that memory sticks that originally cost over 200 yuan have now risen to over 400 yuan, and those that cost over 1,000 yuan have risen to nearly 2,000 yuan. 据海报新闻报道，在浙江杭州，内存条近一个月价格翻了一番。有商户表示， 原来 200 多元的内存条现在涨到 400 多元，原来 1000 多元的则涨到近 2000 元。

Many netizens on social media have shown off the memory sticks they hoarded, feeling lucky to have assembled their computers in advance, saying, 'I never expected memory sticks to become the 'electronic Maotai' now, rising faster than gold.' 社交媒体上不少网友纷纷晒出自己所囤的内存条，庆幸提前组装了电脑，「真没想到内存条如今成了『电子茅台』，涨得比黄金还快。」

TrendForce data shows that in the third quarter of 2025, DRAM prices surged by 171.8% compared to the same period last year. If calculated with today's international spot gold price of $3956, it has only risen by less than 110% compared to last year's low of $1890. TrendForce 集邦咨询数据显示，2025 年第三季度，DRAM 价格较去年同期大幅上涨 171.8%。若以今日国际现货黄金价格 3956 美元计，较去年低位时的 1890 美元也只涨了不到 110%。

The rise in memory stick prices mainly stems from the increase in the price of their core functional unit, storage chips. A storage chip is a semiconductor device used to store digital information, capable of 'writing,' 'saving,' and 'reading' data in electronic systems such as computers, mobile phones, and IoT devices, effectively serving as the 'memory unit' of an electronic system. 内存条价格的上涨主要源于其核心功能单元存储芯片涨价。存储芯片是一种用于存储数字信息的半导体器件，能够将计算机、手机、物联网设备等电子系统中的数据进行「写入」「保存」和「读取」，相当于电子系统的「记忆单元」。

And the mobile phones and computers closest to us have also been affected by the environment, and have begun to show an upward trend in prices. 而离我们最近的手机、电脑也已受环境影响，开始出现了涨价趋势。

item.title: 亚马逊宣布裁员 1.4 万人，加强 AI 投入力度
item.guid: 亚马逊宣布裁员-1.4-万人，加强-AI-投入力度
item.description:
According to multiple media reports, Amazon announced on Tuesday (October 28) local time that it plans to cut 14,000 corporate jobs and increase its investment in AI. 据多家媒体报道，亚马逊于当地时间本周二（10 月 28 日）宣布， 计划裁减 14000 个企业岗位，并且加强 AI 的投入力度。

Beth Galetti, Amazon's head of human resources, stated in a memo to employees that the layoffs will make the company "stronger by further reducing bureaucracy, streamlining layers, and reallocating resources to ensure we are investing in what matters most to our businesses and customers' current and future needs." 亚马逊人力资源负责人 Beth Galetti 在致员工的备忘录中表示，裁员将使公司「通过进一步减少官僚主义、精简层级以及转移资源，确保我们投资于最重要的业务和客户当前及未来的需求，从而变得更加强大。」

Reportedly, Amazon's profit in the latest quarter reached $18 billion, and it increased spending on data centers for developing leading AI systems. Capital expenditures, including data centers, are expected to exceed $120 billion this year, an increase of nearly 50% from last year. 据悉，亚马逊最新一个季度的利润达 180 亿美元，并增加了对开发领先人工智能系统的数据中心的支出。资本支出包括数据中心，预计今年将超过 1200 亿美元，较去年增长近 50%。

It is worth mentioning that Reuters previously reported that Amazon's layoff plan involved as many as 30,000 positions, a very small proportion of the company's 1.55 million total employees, but close to 10% of its 350,000 corporate employees, and would be the largest layoff action since 2022. 值得一提的是，日前路透社曾报道，亚马逊的裁员计划涉及多达 3 万个岗位约占公司 155 万总员工的极小比例，但接近其 35 万企业员工的 10%，并将成为自 2022 年以来最大规模的裁员行动。

According to sources cited by The New York Times, Amazon is expected to begin a new round of corporate layoffs in January next year, after the holiday shopping season. Combining the above news, it is estimated that the next round of layoffs could involve as many as 16,000 people. 而据纽约时报援引知情人士消息， 在假日购物季结束后，亚马逊预计将在明年 1 月开启新一轮企业裁员。结合上述消息推测，下一轮裁员涉及人数或达 16000 名。

item.title: 联想举办首届城市超级智能体论坛
item.guid: 联想举办首届城市超级智能体论坛
item.description:
On October 29, the first Urban Super Intelligent Agent Development Forum, themed "Urban Super Intelligent Agent Leading Smart City 4.0," was successfully held in Shenzhen. 10 月 29 日，以「城市超级智能体 引领智慧城市 4.0」为主题的首届城市超级智能体发展论坛于深圳成功举办。

At the forum, Lenovo Group signed strategic cooperation agreements for urban super intelligent agents with the Shenzhen Guangming District People's Government, China Eastern Communications, and Beitou Xinchuang Group, respectively. All parties will leverage Lenovo's "full-stack AI" products, solutions, and services, as well as the technological advantages of urban super intelligent agents, to deeply integrate technological innovation and urban governance according to local conditions, accelerating the construction of smart cities. 论坛现场，联想集团分别与深圳光明区人民政府、中国东信、北投信创集团签署城市超级智能体战略合作协议。各方将依托联想「全栈 AI」的产品、方案与服务以及城市超级智能体技术优势，因地制宜深度融合科技创新与城市治理，加速智慧城市建设。

Compared to the "city brain" of the Smart City 3.0 era, Smart City 4.0 will equip the "city brain" with robust "limbs" and sensitive "sensory organs," enabling it to no longer rely heavily on human intervention, and allowing cities to possess the capabilities of self-perception, autonomous decision-making, and continuous evolution. 与智慧城市 3.0 时期的「城市大脑」相比，智慧城市 4.0 将为「城市大脑」装上强健的「四肢」和敏感的「五官」，使其不再依赖大量的人工介入，使城市具备自我感知、自主决策、持续进化的能力。

According to Guo Xiaobo, Chief Architect of Smart City in Lenovo China's Solution Services Business Group, the core characteristics of Smart City 4.0 should be "vitality, self-evolution, and sustainable development." He elaborated on Lenovo's Urban Super Intelligent Agent "1+N" architecture: 据联想中国方案服务业务群智慧城市首席架构师郭晓波介绍，智慧城市 4.0 的核心特质应当是「有生命力、自进化、可持续发展」，其详细阐述了联想城市超级智能体「1+N」架构：

    "1" represents a unified super intelligent agent hub, which is responsible for perception, interaction, cognition, decision-making, planning, and orchestration, and achieves computation and resource scheduling at a macroscopic level, coordinating the collaborative operation of intelligent agents in areas such as transportation and energy;

    "N" represents multiple professional intelligent agents in vertical domains, focusing on task execution and feedback in specific scenarios, thereby forming a collaborative system of "global coordination + professional execution."

Guo Xiaobo stated: "Under such a system, Lenovo has reconfigured smart city and government industry solutions, forming a powerful 'prefabricated' solution capability." 郭晓波表示：「在这样一个体系之下，联想重构了智慧城市以及政府行业的解决方案，形成了强大的解决方案『预制』能力。」

item.title: 💡 微软 CEO：AI 从自然语言开始
item.guid: 💡-微软-CEO：AI-从自然语言开始
item.description:
Recently, Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella appeared on "TBPN" and shared numerous insights on hot topics such as AI development, Microsoft's strategy, and the future of the industry. 日前，微软 CEO 萨提亚·纳德拉（Satya Nadella）做客「TBPN」，就 AI 发展、微软战略、行业未来等热点话题发表了诸多见解。

When discussing the rapid development of AI, Nadella was filled with emotion. He summarized: "(AI) started with natural language. Let's predict the next word... Where is it now? Let's rewrite the entire global economy." He believes it's a "wild journey up and down." 当谈到 AI 的飞速发展时，纳德拉感慨万千。他总结道： 「（AI）从自然语言开始。让我们预测下一个词……现在在哪里？让我们重写整个全球经济。」他认为这是一段「上下狂野的旅程」。

At the same time, Nadella keenly pointed out the current "much uncertainty around the tech community," especially regarding discussions about "superintelligence coming out of labs tomorrow" or "a rapid takeoff." He believes Microsoft has more opportunities to add these technologies to products and provide opportunities for entrepreneurs. 同时，纳德拉也敏锐地指出了当前「科技社区周围有很多不确定性」，特别是关于「超级智能明天将从实验室中出来」或「将会有一个快速的起飞」的讨论。他认为，微软有更多机会将这些技术添加到产品中，并为企业家提供机会。

Additionally, regarding Microsoft's former good partner OpenAI, Nadella reviewed history, pointing out that if OpenAI had stuck to its early non-profit path (such as robotics, Dota), "this would not jump out of your direct relevance." 另外，针对微软的昔日好伙伴 OpenAI，纳德拉回顾历史，指出如果 OpenAI 坚持早期的非营利路线（如机器人、Dota），「这不会跳出你的直接相关性」

item.title: 宇树新一代机器狗预热
item.guid: 宇树新一代机器狗预热
item.description:
Yesterday, Unitree Robotics officially announced that it will soon launch a new quadruped robot. 昨日，宇树科技正式宣布，即将推出新款四足机器人。

According to the released poster, the new robot is likely to be a Go series quadruped robot. The official statement also indicated that the new robot will have a compact body and industry-leading performance, stating "power performance ≈ 2 Go 2s." 据公布的海报来看，新款机器人可能为 Go 系列四足机器人。官方还表示，新款机器人将拥有小巧身躯以及行业性能，并给出了 「动力性能≈2 个 Go 2」 。

It is understood that the Unitree Go 2 series is equipped with 4D ultra-wide-angle lidar, empowered by the GPT large model, supports advanced gaits such as inverted walking, adaptive roll-over and standing up, and obstacle climbing. It supports a maximum 15000mAh long-endurance battery, with a peak joint torque of 45N·m, and starts at a price of 9997 yuan. 据了解，宇树 Go 2 系列配备 4D 超广角激光雷达，拥有 GPT 大模型赋能，支持倒立行走、自适应翻身起立和越障攀爬等先进步态，最高支持 15000mAh 长续航电池，关节扭矩峰值达到 45N·m，售价为 9997 元起。

item.title: AI 编程工具 Cursor 发布 2.0
item.guid: AI-编程工具-Cursor-发布-2.0
item.description:
Just now, AI programming tool Cursor officially announced the launch of its 2.0 version and its first programming model, Composer. 刚刚，AI 编程工具 Cursor 正式宣布，推出其 2.0 版本以及其首个编程模型 Composer。

The official statement indicates that Composer is a cutting-edge model, four times faster than equally intelligent models. Specifically, this model is designed for low-latency agent-based coding in Cursor, with most rounds completed within 30 seconds. 官方表示， Composer 是一款前沿模型，其速度是同等智能模型的 4 倍。 具体来看，该模型专为在 Cursor 中进行低延迟的代理式编码而打造，大多数回合在 30 秒内完成。

Composer is trained with a powerful set of tools, including semantic search covering the entire codebase, making it significantly stronger in understanding and processing large codebases. Composer 通过一组强大的工具进行训练，包括覆盖整个代码库的语义搜索，因此在理解与处理大型代码库方面显著更强。

As for Cursor 2.0, it adopts a brand-new multi-agent interface. The official statement indicates that the overall interface is more focused, designed from the bottom up around agents rather than files. Users can choose to easily open files in the new layout when needing to delve into code, or switch back to the classic IDE. 而在 Cursor 2.0 方面，其采用了全新的多代理界面。官方表示，整体界面更加聚焦，自下而上围绕代理而非文件进行设计。用户可以自行选择，在需要深入代码时，仍可在新布局中轻松打开文件，或切换回经典 IDE。

According to the introduction, Cursor 2.0 can easily run multiple agents in parallel without interfering with each other, supported by git worktree or remote machines at the underlying level. Cursor has found that allowing multiple models to simultaneously attempt the same problem and selecting the best outcome significantly improves the final results, especially for more difficult tasks. 据介绍， Cursor 2.0 能够轻松并行运行多个代理 ，且彼此互不干扰，底层由 git worktree 或远程机器提供支持。据 Cursor 发现，让多个模型同时尝试同一问题并择优采用，能显著提升最终结果，尤其是在更难的任务上。

Currently, Cursor 2.0 is available for download. 目前，Cursor 2.0 已开放下载。

item.title: 为 Agent 打造的操作系统，「FlowithOS」发布
item.guid: 为-Agent-打造的操作系统，「FlowithOS」发布
item.description:
Recently, FlowithOS, the world's first operating system built natively for Agents, was officially released, claiming to be "this might be your last browser." 日前，全球首个为 Agent 原生打造的操作系统 FlowithOS 正式发布，并号称「这可能是你的最后一个浏览器」。

According to the official introduction, FlowithOS enables AI to interact with the entire digital world like a human: 官方介绍，FlowithOS 能让 AI 可以像人一样与整个数字世界进行交互：

    Browser-use: Allows AI to autonomously click on web pages, upload/download files, and even manipulate first-person games;

    Terminal-use: Allows AI to access and operate the user's entire computer via the command line, helping users organize files and create in bulk;

    Script-use: Allows AI to autonomously generate scripts in real-time based on user needs and web page status, acquiring information in bulk with hundredfold efficiency.

The FlowithOS Agent is also equipped with online-RL and self-evolution/learning capabilities. Coupled with an experience and memory system, the OS Agent can become increasingly adept at understanding user needs over time. FlowithOS Agent 还搭配了 online-RL、自我进化/学习的能力，配合经验和记忆系统，OS Agent 还能根据时间变得越来越懂用户需求。

In performance testing, FlowithOS overwhelmingly surpassed top browser Agents like OpenAI Atlas and Gemini 2.5 Pro CU in the Online-Mind2Web evaluation, achieving a near-perfect score. 性能测试上，在 Online-Mind2Web 评测中，FlowithOS 以压倒性接近满分成绩超过 OpenAI Atlas、Gemini 2.5 Pro CU 等顶尖浏览器 Agent。

FlowithOS is currently in public beta. 🔗: flowith.com 目前 FlowithOS 已开启公测。🔗：flowith.com

item.title: 混元推出国内首个交互式 AI 播客
item.guid: 混元推出国内首个交互式-AI-播客
item.description:
Yesterday, Tencent Hunyuan launched China's first interactive AI podcast, allowing users to interrupt hosts and guests at any time during listening to ask questions via voice or typing. 昨日，腾讯混元推出国内首个交互式 AI 播客，用户可在收听播客的过程中，随时打断主持人和嘉宾的发言，通过语音或者打字的方式提问。

The official statement indicates that based on large model intent recognition, long-context understanding, multi-turn dialogue, and external network retrieval capabilities, interactive AI podcasts can provide more accurate answers by combining context and background information. 官方表示，基于大模型意图识别、长上下文理解、多轮对话和外部联网检索能力，交互式 AI 播客能够结合上下文以及背景信息，更加准确地给出答案。

In addition to interactive podcasting capabilities, Hunyuan AI Podcast now supports users in autonomously selecting podcast styles, number of hosts, and podcast voices, enabling rapid podcast content creation. 除交互式播客能力，混元 AI 播客现已支持用户对播客风格、主持人数以及播客音色进行自主选择，支持快速进行播客内容创作。

Currently, WeChat Official Accounts, Tencent News, ima, and Tencent Docs PDF have integrated this capability, "allowing users to listen to AI podcasts converted from content," which is widely applied in scenarios such as financial report interpretation, news delivery, and knowledge education. 目前微信公众号、腾讯新闻、ima、腾讯文档 PDF 已经接入该能力，「让用户可以收听到由内容转化成的 AI 播客」，在财研报解读、新闻速递、知识教育等场景得到广泛应用。

item.title: 「宝宝巴士」就 App 跳出成人广告致歉
item.guid: 「宝宝巴士」就-App-跳出成人广告致歉
item.description:
According to The Paper, some netizens recently reported that when opening the "BabyBus Kids Songs" App, a product of BabyBus, the splash screen redirected to inappropriate third-party advertisements, such as vulgar and suggestive live streams, which are unsuitable for children, sparking public concern. 据澎湃新闻报道，有网友近日反映打开宝宝巴士旗下一款「宝宝巴士儿歌」App 时，开屏时跳转到低俗擦边直播等不适合儿童观看的第三方广告，引发社会关注。

Yesterday, BabyBus Co., Ltd. issued an apology and rectification statement regarding the aforementioned incident. BabyBus immediately took down the relevant platform advertisements, ceased cooperation, and promptly initiated a comprehensive self-inspection and rectification, drawing lessons from the incident. 昨日， 宝宝巴士股份有限公司就上述事件发布致歉及整改声明。 宝宝巴士方面在第一时间下线了相关平台广告，并立即停止合作，同时迅速开展全面自查自纠、举一反三。

BabyBus also admitted that this advertising incident exposed problems in its advertising supervision and review , and stated that it had seriously dealt with the head of review, and would subsequently develop an ad-blocking feature that "ad partners cannot monitor" through its component R&D team. 宝宝巴士方面还承认， 此次广告事件暴露出其在广告监管和审核上的问题 ，并表示已对审核负责人进行严肃处理，后续还将通过组件研发团队着手研发广告强制拦截「广告合作方无法监控」的广告。

According to reports, a relevant person in charge from BabyBus responded that the problematic ads appearing on the App were third-party platform ads, and this incident seriously affected the user experience, for which they expressed their sincere apologies. 另据宝宝巴士相关负责人通过报道回应称，出现在 App 上的问题广告是第三方平台接入广告，此次事件严重影响了用户的使用体验，对此他们表示诚挚的歉意。

item.title: 工信部点名爱奇艺、拼多多等人工客服无法接通
item.guid: 工信部点名爱奇艺、拼多多等人工客服无法接通
item.description:
According to "MIIT Micro-Report" news, the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology recently announced the telecommunications service quality for the third quarter of 2025, introducing the relevant situation from three aspects: key work on telecommunications services, user complaints and appeals, work requirements, and service tips. 据「工信微报」消息，工业和信息化部近日通告 2025 年第三季度电信服务质量情况，从电信服务重点工作情况、电信用户投诉申诉情况、工作要求及服务提示等三方面，对 2025 年第三季度电信服务质量有关情况进行了介绍。

It was mentioned that the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology organized third-party agencies to dial-test the customer service hotlines of some key internet companies. Sogou Browser and Dida Chuxing's customer service hotlines did not provide human customer service, while iQiyi, Zhuanzhuan, and Sohu News's human customer service could not be reached. Relevant enterprises have been urged to rectify and effectively improve their service capabilities. 其中提到， 工业和信息化部组织第三方机构对部分重点互联网企业客服热线进行拨测，搜狗浏览器、嘀嗒出行的客服热线未提供人工客服，爱奇艺、转转、搜狐新闻的人工客服无法接通，已督促相关企业进行整改，切实提高服务能力。

At the same time, the announcement also mentioned promoting the "secondary number renewal" service and deeply advancing the one-click unbinding of historical internet application accounts. Currently, it covers over 230 mainstream applications, has processed over 260 million unbinding requests, and has served over 4.3 million users. 同时，通告中还提到推广「二次号码焕新」服务，深入推进一键解绑历史互联网应用账号工作，目前已覆盖 230 余款主流应用，处理解绑申请超 2.6 亿次，累计服务用户超 430 万人。

In addition, it will also promote the "transparent and reliable telecommunications services" initiative, guide basic telecommunications enterprises to streamline and optimize tariff packages, with over 99% of tariffs on sale being publicly disclosed; unify telemarketing numbers, and basically establish a centralized authentication and verification platform for business subscriptions to ensure user informed consent. 另外，还将推进电信业务「明白办、放心用」行动，指导基础电信企业精简优化资费套餐，在售资费公示率达到 99% 以上；统一电话营销号码，基本建成业务订购集中鉴权核验平台，确保用户知情同意。

item.title: 多家零食店被曝「糖果找零钱」
item.guid: 多家零食店被曝「糖果找零钱」
item.description:
According to a report by China Youth Daily, a netizen from Hebei recently posted that there is a Zhao Yiming snack shop near their home, and when they went shopping with cash, the cashier used tangerine peel candy as "change" at checkout. 据中国青年报报道，近日，一位河北的网友发帖称，其家附近有一家赵一鸣零食店，拿现金去购物，结账时店员却用陈皮糖「找零」。

The shopping receipt and "change" situation shared by the netizen showed: 该网友晒出的购物小票及「找零」情况显示：

The original order price was 5.90 yuan, promotional discount 0.71 yuan, cash rounding 0.09 yuan, payable amount 5.10 yuan, actual cash paid 10 yuan, change 4.90 yuan. However, the store's "change" was not 4.9 yuan in cash, but 4 one-yuan coins, 7 tangerine peel candies, and one quail egg.

The netizen who posted commented, "I searched online, (tangerine peel candy) only costs a few cents each, but it can be used as one jiao (ten cents) for change. The more I think about it, the angrier I get." 发帖网友在评论区表示，「网上搜了一下，（陈皮糖）只要几分钱一颗，找零却能抵一毛，越想越生气。」

The reporter called the Zhao Yiming snack shop using the phone number on the receipt. A lady, who identified herself as a franchisee of Zhao Yiming snack shop, admitted to using candies instead of coins for change, but said this situation was rare. Regarding customers explicitly refusing candy as "change," the lady stated that she would communicate and explain to the customer, "I'd rather give him more items." She would not conflict with customers. 而记者据通过小票上的电话致电赵一鸣零食店，一女士称她是赵一鸣零食店加盟商，她承认有用糖果代替零钱找零的行为，不过这种情况很少。对于顾客明确提出拒绝用糖果「找零」的情况，该女士表示，会和顾客沟通解释，「我宁可多给他东西。」不会和顾客发生冲突。

Zhao Yiming's official customer service stated, "Using candy for change is a store rule, but we, Zhao Yiming, do not have this rule." Another customer service representative said, "We have a unified regulation that does not allow using candy for change. In such a situation, you can call us to complain, and after verification by customer service, the corresponding store will be penalized." 赵一鸣官方客服表示，「用糖找零这个是门店的规则，我们赵一鸣是没有这个规则的。」另一位客服则表示，「我们有统一的规定是不允许用糖找零的，这种情况您可以打电话给我们投诉，客服这边帮您核实以后也会对相应的门店进行一个处罚。」

Yesterday, the topic "Miniso Candy Change" also trended on hot searches. A customer from Zhongshan reported that her daughter often buys things at a local Miniso store, always paying with cash, but the staff gives candy as change. 昨日，话题「名创优品 糖果找零」也冲上热搜。有中山的顾客反映，她的女儿经常去当地一家名创优品买东西，每次都用现金结账，但店员找零却用糖果找零。

In response, Miniso stated that the service standards of the staff at the involved store did not meet headquarters requirements and they are undergoing retraining. Subsequently, the company will conduct a new round of inspections, standardization, and rectification for all stores to prevent similar situations from happening again. Regarding Ms. Li's situation, Miniso will proactively contact her to coordinate and resolve her demands. 对此，名创优品方面表示，涉事门店人员服务标准不符合总部要求，正在接受重新培训，后续公司将针对所有门店进行新一轮排查、规范和整改，避免相同情况再次发生。针对李女士的情况，名创优品将主动联系，争取协调解决她的诉求。

item.title: 国产新游《长生：白夜无名》实机演示公布
item.guid: 国产新游《长生：白夜无名》实机演示公布
item.description:
Yesterday, "Longevity: Nameless Night," a single-player buy-to-own action-adventure game developed by Shiyi Games, released its gameplay demo trailer. 昨日，由拾一游戏研发的单机买断制动作冒险游戏《长生：白夜无名》公布了其实机演示预告。

According to Gamersky, the trailer not only included basic information such as story cutscenes and game style but also featured a complete and highly credible gameplay demo, covering multiple scenarios like map exploration, environmental puzzles, mob combat, and boss battles. 据游民星空报道，预告片中不仅包括剧情播片、游戏风格等基本信息，还加入了一段完整且置信度较高的实机流程 Demo，涵盖了地图探索、场景解谜、杂兵群战与 Boss 战等多个场景。

From the information revealed in the video, it is known that this work adopts a semi-historical, semi-fictional story background. The protagonist, as a member of a secret organization established to find the elixir of immortality for the emperor, will venture into deep mountains and dense forests, and other levels that may hide the secret of immortality, to seek longevity. 从片中透露的信息可知，本作采用了半史实、半架空的故事背景，主角将作为一名为皇帝寻找长生不老之药而设的秘密机构成员，闯入可能埋藏不老秘密的深山密林等关卡中寻觅长生。

According to analysis, judging from the overall style and tone of the visuals, this work should have been developed using the UE5 engine. Analyzing only the effects shown in the trailer, the production team of "Longevity: Nameless Night" has already achieved a relatively mature grasp of the UE5 engine. 据分析，从画面整体的风格调性来看，本作应当采用了 UE5 引擎开发，仅从预告片中展现出的效果分析，《长生：白夜无名》制作组对 UE5 引擎的掌握已然较为成熟。

item.title: 电影《昨日青春》确认引进
item.guid: 电影《昨日青春》确认引进
item.description:
According to Sina Movies, "Yesterday's Youth," directed by Soraon, has been confirmed for import, with its release date yet to be determined. 据新浪电影消息，空音央执导的《昨日青春》确认引进，档期待定。

It is reported that Soraon previously directed his father Ryuichi Sakamoto's posthumous documentary film "Ryuichi Sakamoto: Opus." "Yesterday's Youth" is his debut feature film as writer and director. It was nominated for the Horizons section at the 81st Venice International Film Festival and won the Roberto Rossellini Award - Jury Honor at the 8th Pingyao International Film Festival, among others. 据悉，空音央曾执导过父亲坂本龙一的遗作纪录电影《坂本龙一：杰作》，《昨日青春》是他自编自导的首部剧情长片，曾入围第 81 届威尼斯国际电影节地平线单元，获第 8 届平遥国际电影展罗伯托·罗西里尼荣誉·评审荣誉等。

The film is set in a near-future Tokyo, plagued by frequent earthquakes, and revolves around five high school students about to graduate, including Yuta and Sachi. One day, the two conspired to prank the principal, leading to the installation of a surveillance system at school. Subsequently, amidst Japan's increasingly dire situation, Sachi grew more disillusioned with the world, while Yuta seemed completely oblivious. Due to differing goals and philosophies, the two gradually drifted apart, and their deep friendship forged since childhood faced rupture... 电影设定在近未来地震频发的东京，围绕悠太、幸等五名即将毕业的高中生展开故事。某天，两人合伙捉弄了校长，导致学校安装了监控系统。随后在日本日益严峻的局势中，幸对世界愈发感到失望，而悠太却似乎完全没有意识到这一点。因目标和理念不同，两人逐渐疏离，自幼结下的深厚友谊面临破裂……

The film stars Hayato Kurihara and Yukito Hidaka. 该片由栗原飒人、日高由起刀主演。

item.title: 中国电影诞生 120 周年金银纪念币下月发行
item.guid: 中国电影诞生-120-周年金银纪念币下月发行
item.description:
According to the People's Bank of China, it is scheduled to issue a set of gold and silver commemorative coins for the 120th anniversary of the birth of Chinese cinema on November 11, 2025. This set of gold and silver commemorative coins consists of 3 pieces, including 2 gold commemorative coins and 1 silver commemorative coin, all of which are legal tender of the People's Republic of China. 据中国人民银行消息，其定于 2025 年 11 月 11 日发行中国电影诞生 120 周年金银纪念币一套。该套金银纪念币共 3 枚，其中金质纪念币 2 枚，银质纪念币 1 枚，均为中华人民共和国法定货币。

It is reported that the front design of this set of gold and silver commemorative coins features the National Emblem of the People's Republic of China, along with the country name and year. The reverse side is divided into: 据悉，该套金银纪念币正面图案均为中华人民共和国国徽，并刊国名、年号。背面则分为：

    The reverse design of the 150-gram circular gold commemorative coin is composed of elements such as film, mountains, digital micromirrors, streaming player symbols, and the number "120", and is inscribed with the Chinese characters "中国电影诞生一百二十周年", the English words "The 120th Anniversary of the Birth of Chinese Cinema", and its denomination. The face value is 2000 yuan, with a fineness of 99.9%, and a maximum mintage of 300 pieces.

    The reverse design of the 3-gram circular gold commemorative coin is composed of elements such as a film reel decorative shape and the number "120", and is inscribed with the Chinese characters "中国电影诞生一百二十周年", the English words "The 120th Anniversary of the Birth of Chinese Cinema", and its denomination. The face value is 50 yuan, with a fineness of 99.9%, and a maximum mintage of 20,000 pieces.

    The reverse design of the 30-gram circular silver commemorative coin is composed of elements such as a projector decorative shape, light beams, and the number "120", and is inscribed with the Chinese characters "中国电影诞生一百二十周年", the English words "The 120th Anniversary of the Birth of Chinese Cinema", and its denomination. The face value is 10 yuan, with a fineness of 99.9%, and a maximum mintage of 30,000 pieces.

item.title: 电影《旁观者》重新定档 11 月
item.guid: 电影《旁观者》重新定档-11-月
item.description:
Recently, the film "The Bystander" has been rescheduled for November 1st, after its official withdrawal announcement on October 23rd. 日前，电影《旁观者》重新定档 11 月 1 日，此前曾于 10 月 23 日官宣撤档。

The film tells the story of Chen Jiahui, who returns to his hometown after 16 years away because his father Chen Weimin is critically ill. After reuniting with his elder brother Chen Jiaxing and elder sister Chen Jiayuan, he uncovers long-hidden family secrets by exploring his father's life trajectory, ultimately confronting the unresolved issues between father and son. 影片影片讲述离家 16 年的陈家辉因父亲陈为民病危重返故乡，在与哥哥陈家兴、姐姐陈家媛重聚后，通过探寻父亲生活轨迹揭开家庭隐藏多年的秘密，最终直面父子间未解心结的故事。

The film is directed by Songtaiga, produced by Du Qingchun, starring Chen Kun, Wang Yanhui, and Liu Mintao, with Rongzhong Erjia, An Zehao, Chen Yisha, and Shan Yuhao as main cast, and Wang Jinsong making a special appearance. 该片由松太加执导、杜庆春监制，陈坤、王砚辉、刘敏涛领衔主演，容中尔甲、安泽豪、陈依莎、单禹豪主演，王劲松特别出演。
